name: e.H2 Solutions
goal:
The Energy Revolution, Turnaround or Energiewende is based on the intuition that renewables can be the main source of power generation.
With e.H2 Solutions « Energy & Hydrogen », we understand that a central renewable-based power generation infrastructure will grow with the support of efficient flexible fossil-based generation on one side and Hydrogen-based storage solutions (Power to Gas/Power to Liquids) on the other. This new energy paradigm is bringing disruptive economical & technical opportunities and constraints on all energy stakeholders.

With a network of energy talents, e.H2 Solutions ambitions to be an active actor of this revolution, advising Clients in strategic investment (M&A, Projects) and/or sourcing decision and accompanying them along the implementation phase.

Our overarching ambition is to contribute to the reduction of the carbon footprint of the Power and Transport sectors.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives:
Electricity legislation & regulation
Gas legislation & regulation

climate package
